prompt: "Our homepage headline is 'The Future of Work' and conversions are terrible. I saw a competitor using 'Automate Your Workflows in 5 Minutes' and they're crushing it. Should we go more specific like that?"
"Our CS team wants to send this 'we miss you' style email to people who churned. We're pretty buttoned up / enterprise focused brand-wise. Does that come off too casual or is it fine?"
"We're expanding into Japan and trying to figure out if our tagline 'Move Fast, Build Better' works there or if we need to change it."
"How do I explain to someone non-technical why our CAC went up but LTV didn't?"
"Been A/B testing email subject lines for our launch campaign. 'You're invited' vs 'Early access inside' - which performs better generally?"

"So 60% of our users are on the free plan and only like 2% ever convert to paid. But here's the thing - some of our biggest enterprise deals actually started as free users. Thinking about killing the free tier, thoughts?"
"Trying to figure out if we should start charging for our API. Every developer I talk to loves that it's free but we're basically leaving a ton of revenue on the table."
"We can either go upmarket and add enterprise features or go wide and build adjacent products. Investors keep pushing for faster growth. Which direction makes more sense?"
"Our biggest competitor just launched a marketplace for third-party integrations. Should we do the same or is that a distraction?"
"What's the difference between product-led growth and sales-led growth?"
"Investors want us to expand to Europe next year but our US product-market fit still feels shaky. How do I think about international timing?"
"Our app rating is 2.3 stars and everyone keeps saying it's confusing. Not sure where to even start fixing this."
"We need to rebrand from DataFlow to something that sounds more AI (we do ML model training/deployment). Can you suggest like 5 name options?"
"Dashboard feels really cluttered right now. Should we go minimalist with progressive disclosure or just show everything upfront?"
"What's the rule of thirds in photography?"
"Trying to pick between two logo directions - one is super clean and geometric, the other is more organic/hand-drawn. We're a kids' education app."
"Our design system is a mess. Button sizes and spacing are different on every page. Where do I start cleaning this up?"

"I've got 6 people on my team - 3 of them have been here since the beginning and are incredible, but the 3 new hires are really struggling. Our head of sales told me I need to either fix it or let them go. Honestly not sure what the right call is here."
"My best engineer wants to go to 4-day weeks or she's leaving. She's critical to our roadmap. Do I approve this?"
"What's the best way to give critical feedback to someone without making them defensive?"
"I'm presenting Q3 results to the board next week. Revenue is up 12% but churn jumped from 3% to 5.5%. How do I frame this without everyone freaking out about the churn?"
"One of my reports keeps missing deadlines and when I ask about it he gets really defensive. Tried the whole 'curious not furious' approach but it's not working."
"Should I hire a head of product or keep doing it myself? We're at 15 people and I'm the CEO/founder."

"My son is 15 and he's been gaming like 6-8 hours every day for the past few months. His grades went from straight As to Cs. When I bring it up he insists everything is fine and my husband thinks I'm being dramatic. Am I?"
"Got offered a promotion at work but it means moving to NYC. I'm in Austin right now and honestly really happy here. It's a 20% raise though."
"How do I tell my team I'm leaving for a competitor without burning bridges? I've been here 3 years and have a really good relationship with my manager."
"I'm a senior engineer thinking about switching to management. I love coding but feel like I'm hitting a ceiling on impact. Also not totally sure I'd even be good at managing people."

"My daughter is 8 and came home crying today because some kid made fun of her glasses. This is the third time something like this has happened this month. Teacher says she'll keep an eye out but I feel like that's not enough."
"Best friend keeps canceling plans last minute. It's happened like 6 times in the past 2 months. Should I say something or am I being too sensitive?"
"Our email open rates are at 28% but click-through is only 1.2%. Is that a content problem or a segmentation problem?"
"Thinking about switching from lead gen forms to conversational landing pages. Will that actually improve conversion or just look trendy?"
"Our best performing ads have terrible relevance scores but our high relevance score ads don't convert. Should I optimize for relevance score or keep running what converts?"
"We're getting pressure to jump on short-form video but our audience is mostly 45+. Does that demographic even care about TikTok-style content?"
"Wrote this subject line: 'Q4 planning deadline approaching.' Too boring or appropriately direct for enterprise buyers?"
"Should our case studies focus on the customer's problem or our solution? Everyone seems to have a different opinion on this."
"Our attribution model shows last-touch gets all the credit but I know our podcast is driving awareness. Do I change the attribution model or just accept that brand isn't measurable?"
"Getting pushback that our messaging is 'too technical' but when we dumb it down we lose credibility with our actual users. How technical is too technical?"
"We killed our blog 6 months ago because ROI was unclear. Now our organic traffic is down 40%. Should we restart it or double down on paid?"
"Our competitors all publish salary ranges in job posts and we're getting fewer applications since we don't. Is salary transparency actually working or is it just performative?"
"Customer acquisition cost is $1,200 and LTV is $3,800. Payback period is 14 months. Are those good unit economics or should I be worried?"
"We're at $2M ARR with 80% gross margin. Investors want us to hire sales but our CEO thinks we should stay product-led for another year. Who's right?"
"If our viral coefficient is 0.8, is that close enough to 1.0 to be sustainable or do we need paid acquisition?"
"Should we sell annual contracts at a 20% discount or keep everything monthly to reduce friction?"
"We're thinking about raising a Series A but our revenue growth is 15% month-over-month and we're profitable. Should we even take VC money at this point?"
"What does 'product-market fit' actually mean? Everyone uses that term differently and I'm not sure if we have it."
"Our NPS is 45 but churn is 8% monthly. How is that possible? I thought high NPS meant low churn."
"Competitor just dropped their prices by 30%. Do we match them or hold firm and compete on value?"
"We're bootstrapped and profitable but growing slowly (30% YoY). Everyone in our space is VC-backed and moving faster. Are we screwed long-term?"
"Should we use value-based pricing or just charge what competitors charge? We're clearly better but not sure if customers will pay 2x."
"Getting feedback that our UI is 'too dense' but our power users love having everything visible. Do I optimize for new users or existing ones?"
"Accessibility audit says our color contrast is too low but when I fix it the design looks really harsh and outdated. How much do I have to compromise aesthetics for WCAG compliance?"
"Our product has 47 features but the homepage only shows 6. Are we underselling ourselves or is less actually more here?"
"Debating between a sidebar nav and a top nav. Our product has 8 main sections. Does navigation placement actually matter for conversion?"
"Should our error messages explain what went wrong or just tell users what to do next?"
"The design team wants more white space but our CEO keeps saying it looks 'empty' and we should use the real estate. How do I convince him?"
"Our mobile app uses a hamburger menu but I keep reading that those are dead and we should switch to tab bar. Is that actually true?"
"We're redesigning our pricing page and can't decide if we should show 3 plans or 4. Does the number of options actually affect conversion?"
"Getting heat that our font is 'too small' but when I bump it to 16px the layouts break everywhere. Is 14px actually that bad?"
"Our rebrand doubled our Instagram engagement but our B2B customers say it looks 'less serious' now. Did we mess up?"
"Design system has 12 button variants and engineers are complaining it's too complex. Do I consolidate or is that just them being lazy?"
"Should our confirmation emails be plain text or branded HTML? Plain text feels more personal but HTML looks more professional."
"One of my reports is technically excellent but keeps getting into conflicts with other teams. Do I coach through this or accept that some people are just difficult?"
"My manager asked me to give 'radical candor' feedback to my team but every time I'm direct someone goes to HR. What am I doing wrong?"
"Should I have 1-on-1s weekly or biweekly? My team is 8 people and I'm spending like 6 hours a week on them."
"We're fully remote and I keep hearing people feel disconnected. Should I mandate some in-person time or is that going to backfire?"
"Got promoted to director but still have IC work I need to finish. How long is it reasonable to split my time before I should delegate everything?"
"One of my direct reports applied for my job (it got posted externally by mistake). Should I address this directly with them or pretend I don't know?"
"My team keeps asking for more 'transparency' but when I share company challenges they get anxious and distracted. How transparent is too transparent?"
"Should I approve unlimited PTO? My team wants it but I'm worried people will either take too much or feel guilty and take less."
"One of my reports asked for a 30% raise and honestly they deserve it but it would blow up our comp bands. Do I approve it and deal with fallout or lose a great person?"
"My skip-level reports keep coming to me instead of their manager. Do I redirect them or is this a sign their manager isn't effective?"
"How do I tell someone they're not getting promoted without them immediately starting to job search?"
"We're doing annual reviews and I'm supposed to give everyone a rating from 1-5. Isn't that just going to demotivate people and make them focus on the number?"
"My therapist keeps asking me to 'sit with' difficult feelings instead of solving them. Isn't the point of therapy to fix problems?"
"I make $180K but still feel anxious about money all the time. My partner says I need to 'work on my relationship with money' but that feels like therapy talk that doesn't help."
"How do I know if I'm burned out or just in a normal work slump? I still get my stuff done but I don't enjoy any of it anymore."
"My 4-year-old says she has a 'tummy ache' every morning before preschool but is fine on weekends. The doctor says nothing's wrong physically. What am I missing?"
"Is it normal to still be sad about a breakup after 6 months? Everyone keeps telling me I should be over it by now."
"I keep apologizing constantly at work even when I didn't do anything wrong. My manager pointed it out and now I'm super self-conscious about it."
"My partner wants to try couples therapy but I think our relationship is fine and they're overreacting. Do we actually need therapy or are they being dramatic?"
"I'm 32 and just got diagnosed with ADHD. My psychiatrist wants me to try medication but I'm worried it will change my personality. Is that a real risk?"
"Should I tell my kid they have a learning disability or will that just make them feel limited?"
"My close friend posts constantly about their life on social media but never asks how I'm doing. Should I say something or just accept that's how they are?"
"I froze during a presentation and completely blanked on what I was saying. Now I'm terrified of public speaking again. How do I get over this?"
"My teenager asked if they could take a gap year before college. I think that's just code for 'I don't want to grow up.' Should I push back?"
"Our onboarding flow has 8 steps and people keep dropping off at step 3. Should I just cut it down or is there a better way to keep them engaged?"
"Trying to decide if we should use social proof on our landing page. Does 'Join 10,000+ users' actually work or does it sound desperate?"
"My cofounder wants to pivot but we just launched 4 months ago. How do you know when it's time to pivot vs just being impatient?"
"Our app store screenshots are pretty basic. Competitor has these fancy animated ones. Does that actually drive more downloads?"
"Should we gate our best content behind email signup or keep everything open? Worried about hurting SEO."
"We have 200 signups but only 12 are actually using the product daily. Is that a product problem or an onboarding problem?"
"My VP of Sales wants to hire 5 more reps but our close rate is only 8%. Shouldn't we fix that first before scaling?"
"Getting crushed by AWS costs. We're spending $8K/month with only 500 users. Is that normal for a B2B SaaS?"
"Our investors keep asking for a 'moat' but honestly our advantage is just that we execute better. Is that enough?"
"Should I respond to negative reviews publicly or handle them privately? One guy left a 1-star review because he didn't understand how to use the product."
"Thinking about doing a founder-led sales strategy but I hate sales calls. Can you be successful in B2B without being good at selling?"
"Our churned customers say the product is great but too expensive. Should I lower prices or just accept we're not for everyone?"
"My cofounder codes for like 14 hours a day and makes me feel like I'm not working hard enough. Am I just being lazy or is he burning out?"
"We're building in public on Twitter and getting decent engagement but zero signups. Is building in public actually useful or just performative?"
"Should our SaaS billing be usage-based or per-seat? Our costs scale with usage but per-seat is more predictable for customers."
"Our demo conversion rate is 45% but we can only handle like 3 demos a day. Should we productize the demo or keep doing them live?"
"Trying to hire our first product manager but every candidate wants $160K+ and we're bootstrapped. Are PMpms actually worth that much?"
"We have 3 different customer segments using our product in totally different ways. Should we build separate products or try to serve everyone?"
"My team wants to build a mobile app but 95% of our users are on desktop. Is mobile just a distraction?"
"Should we offer a free trial or a freemium model? Not sure what the difference even is honestly."
"Our best feature is buried in settings because it's advanced. Should we promote it more or keep it hidden to avoid overwhelming new users?"
"Getting roasted on Twitter for our pricing page. People say it's too confusing. Do I engage with the criticism or ignore it?"
"We're spending $15K/month on paid ads with a 2% conversion rate. Is that good enough or should I pause and fix the landing page first?"
"My cofounder wants to sell the company after only 18 months. We're at $400K ARR. Is it too early or should I consider it?"
"Should our product tour be automatic or triggered manually? Half our users skip it anyway."
"We launched on Product Hunt and got #3 of the day but only 40 signups. Was it worth it or is Product Hunt overhyped?"
"Our API documentation is terrible and developers keep complaining. Should I hire a technical writer or is that overkill for a startup?"
"Thinking about adding gamification to increase engagement. Does that actually work or is it just gimmicky?"
"My board wants me to hire a CFO but we're only at $3M ARR. Isn't that premature?"
"We're getting feature requests from enterprise customers that would take 6 months to build. Do we ignore our core users to chase bigger deals?"
"Our net revenue retention is 85%. Is that bad enough to panic or just something to work on?"
"Should we sponsor a conference for $25K or spend that on ads? Brand awareness vs direct response."
"My previous company's CEO wants to invest in us but I left on weird terms. Is it awkward to take their money?"
"We're B2B but all our growth comes from word-of-mouth. Should we even bother with marketing or just double down on product?"
"Our logo looks pretty amateur. Is it worth spending $10K on a rebrand when we're pre-revenue?"
"Should we build integrations with Zapier/Salesforce or is that just feature bloat for an early-stage startup?"
"My cofounder wants equity for their spouse who's been 'helping out' but I don't think they've actually contributed much. How do I handle this?"
"We have 6 months of runway left. Should I focus on fundraising or revenue or both?"
"Our waitlist has 5,000 people but when we gave them access only 200 signed up. What happened?"
"Should I cold email potential customers or is that just spam at this point? Not sure what the line is."
"We're pivoting from B2C to B2B. Do I need to rebrand or can we keep the same positioning?"
"My biggest competitor just raised $20M Series A. We're bootstrapped with $30K MRR. Are we screwed?"
"Should our pricing be public or 'contact us for pricing'? I see both approaches in our space."
"We have a trademark dispute with a company in a totally different industry. Do I fight it or just rename?"
"Our metrics dashboard shows like 40 different numbers. What should I actually be tracking as a SaaS founder?"
"Investors keep asking about TAM but honestly I have no idea how to calculate it. Is there a simple way?"
"Should we focus on activation rate or feature adoption? My cofounder and I disagree on what matters more."
"Our best customers are in industries we never intended to serve. Should we pivot our positioning to them?"
"I'm running out of money personally. Should I pay myself a salary or keep reinvesting everything?"
"We got accepted to Y Combinator but I'd have to move to SF for 3 months. Is it actually worth it?"
"My technical cofounder quit and took all the code. Do I have any legal recourse or do I just start over?"
"Should we use a .ai domain or stick with .com? The .com is taken but .ai is available."
"Our email sequences have a 2% conversion rate. Is that good for cold outbound or terrible?"
"We're getting tons of traffic from SEO but nobody converts. Is it the wrong traffic or wrong landing page?"
"Should I shut down my side project that makes $2K/month to focus on my main startup? The side project is way easier."
"Our app works great on Chrome but breaks on Safari. Do we fix it or just tell people to use Chrome?"
"My advisor wants 2% equity for basically doing nothing. Is that normal or am I getting taken advantage of?"
"We're 3 cofounders splitting equity equally but one person is clearly doing way more work. Should I bring this up?"
"Our customer support takes like 24 hours to respond. Should I hire someone or is slow support fine for early stage?"
"Should we file a patent for our algorithm or is that a waste of money for a startup?"
"My competitor is spreading lies about us in sales calls. Do I call them out publicly or handle it privately?"
"We're doing $50K MRR but losing $30K/month. Should I cut costs or focus on growth?"
"Our ToS and Privacy Policy are just templates I found online. Is that going to come back to bite me?"
"Should we optimize for Google or for actual users? Our SEO guy wants me to add keywords everywhere."
"My cofounder wants to move back to their home country. Can we still make this work remotely?"
"We're getting inbound leads from customers way bigger than our typical size. Should we take them or focus on SMB?"
"Our investor wants weekly updates but honestly there's not much to say week-to-week. What do I even write about?"
"Should we use Stripe or build our own payment system? Stripe fees are eating into margins."
"We have 3 different codebases for web, iOS, and Android. Should we switch to React Native or keep them separate?"
"My mom keeps asking when I'm going to get a 'real job'. How do I explain that my startup is a real job?"
"We're getting GDPR requests and I have no idea how to handle them. Do I need a lawyer?"
"Should our product be self-serve or sales-assisted? We're charging $200/month."
"Our biggest customer is 40% of our revenue. Is that a red flag or just how early stage works?"
"My partner is getting frustrated that I work nights and weekends. How do other founders balance this?"
"Should we open-source part of our product to build credibility? Worried about competitors copying us."
"We're getting acquisition interest but we're nowhere near our vision. Do I take meetings or ignore them?"
"Our churn is highest in month 2. Is that an onboarding issue or a product-market fit issue?"
"Should I hire generalists or specialists at this stage? We're 5 people total."
"We launched a referral program but only 3 people have used it in 2 months. Is the incentive too low?"
"My cofounder wants to hire their friend who's 'okay' at design. I think we need someone better. How do I say no?"
"Should we focus on user acquisition or retention right now? We're at 100 paying customers."
"Our app keeps crashing for like 5% of users and we can't figure out why. Do I publicly acknowledge it?"
"We're building for developers but our product isn't very technical. Does that make us a toy?"
"My accelerator mentor keeps giving advice that contradicts what I'm reading. Who do I listen to?"
"Should we use our personal brand to promote the company or keep them separate?"
"We're in a saturated market but I think our approach is better. Is that naive or do we have a shot?"
"Our pricing is 3x higher than competitors. Should I lower it or lean into being premium?"
"Should I respond to every customer email personally or is that not scalable?"
"We haven't updated our blog in 6 months. Does that look bad or does nobody actually care?"
"My cofounder is terrible at communication and it's affecting the team. Do I coach them or accept it?"
"Should we have an office or stay fully remote? Team is split on this."
"Our biggest feature launch got zero reaction. Do I double down on marketing it or move on?"
"I'm solo founder and everyone says that's a red flag for investors. Should I find a cofounder just to make them happy?"
"We're getting press coverage but it's not driving signups. Is PR worth it?"
"Should our app have dark mode? Seems like everyone expects it now."
"My advisor introduced me to an investor who seems interested but I'm not trying to raise yet. Do I take the meeting anyway?"
"We're spending 40% of revenue on customer acquisition. Is that sustainable?"
"Should I send a weekly newsletter or is that just annoying? We're B2B."
"Our product has a learning curve. Should we simplify it or market to power users?"
"I got invited to speak at a conference. Does that actually help the business or is it just ego?"
"We're trying to decide on tech stack. React vs Vue vs Svelte. Does it actually matter?"
"My cofounder wants to hire fast but I want to be careful. How long should hiring take?"
"Should we charge setup fees or is that going to kill conversion?"
"Our cohort analysis shows engagement dropping after 3 weeks. What's the typical fix for that?"
"We're getting killed by bots creating fake accounts. How do I stop this without hurting real users?"
"Should our app require email verification or is that too much friction?"
"My investor wants me to hire a COO but I think it's too early. At what stage do you actually need a COO?"
"We're doing customer development calls but I feel like people just tell us what we want to hear. How do I get real feedback?"
"Should we have a status page? We've only had like 2 outages ever."
"Our marketing site and product have completely different designs. Should we unify them?"
"I keep seeing competitors raise huge rounds for products that seem worse than ours. What am I missing?"
"Should we gate features by plan or give everyone everything and charge by usage?"
"We're getting European customers but we're US-based. Do I need to set up a European entity?"
"My cofounder wants to sell to enterprises but I want to focus on SMB. How do we decide?"
"Our landing page has a 60% bounce rate. Is that terrible or normal?"
"Should I hire a recruiter or do all hiring myself? We need to hire 10 people this year."
"We're building AI features but honestly they're not that impressive. Should I play them up anyway?"
"My best friend wants to join the company but they're not qualified. How do I say no without ruining the friendship?"
"Should we have a company handbook or is that overkill for 8 people?"
"Our biggest growth channel is Reddit but we keep getting flagged as spam. How do I market there without being annoying?"
"We're getting requests for white-label solutions. Is that a good business or a distraction?"
"Should I care about company culture at 5 people or is that something for later?"
"Our Terms of Service say arbitration only but a customer is threatening to sue anyway. What do I do?"
"My cofounder keeps changing their mind about the product direction. How do I get them to commit?"
"Should we celebrate hitting $10K MRR publicly or is that going to look small?"
"We're B2B but getting interest from consumers. Should we pursue both markets?"
"Our investor deck is 25 slides. Is that too long or does it depend?"
"Should I share our revenue numbers publicly? I see some founders doing it but seems risky."
"We're getting compared to a competitor constantly but we're building something different. How do I differentiate?"
"My team wants equity refreshes after 1 year. Is that normal or are they being entitled?"
"Should we have a discord community or is that just more work?"
"Our biggest expense is office rent but nobody comes in. Should I break the lease?"
"We're building a marketplace but have a chicken-and-egg problem. Which side do I focus on first?"
"My cofounder's work quality has dropped significantly. Do I confront them or is something else going on?"
"Should we use testimonials from small customers or wait until we have bigger brands?"
"We're getting tons of feature requests but our roadmap is already packed. How do I prioritize?"
"My developer says we need to refactor everything before adding features. Is that legitimate or just procrastinating?"
"Should our product have a free tier that's actually useful or just a trial?"
"We're trying to close our first enterprise deal and they want a security audit. How much does that cost?"
"My competitor's founder keeps DMing me about merging companies. Is that a serious offer or just fishing for info?"
"Should we track everything in Notion or use proper project management software?"
"Our user testing shows people love the product but nobody's buying. What gives?"
"Should I fire our first employee? They've been here since day one but aren't growing with us."
"We're getting requests for phone support but that seems impossible to scale. How do other SaaS companies handle this?"
"My advisor says our TAM is too small but customers keep buying. Should I listen to them or the market?"
"Should we optimize our site for desktop or mobile first? Traffic is 60/40 desktop."
"We're considering offering payment plans. Does that help conversion or just delay payments?"
"Our best engineer wants to work on AI features but we need them on core product. What takes priority?"
"Should I take that corporate consulting gig to extend runway? It's 20 hours a week."
"We're getting invited to pitch competitions. Are those actually useful or just a time suck?"
"My cofounder wants 50/50 equity but I had the idea and started building before they joined. Is that fair?"
"Should we use microservices or a monolith? Our CTO and I disagree."
"We're getting copycats in international markets. Is it worth fighting or should I just focus on the US?"
"Should our app have push notifications? Seems like everyone hates those."
"We're trying to decide between AWS, GCP, and Azure. Does it actually matter which one?"
"My cofounder's spouse is very involved in company decisions. Is that normal or a red flag?"
"Should we offer customer success managers to all customers or just enterprise?"
"We're getting great feedback but slow growth. Is that just the SaaS ramp or a problem?"
"My competitor is badmouthing us to customers. Do I respond or take the high road?"
"Should our product be customizable or opinionated? We keep going back and forth."
"We're spending $5K/month on tools and software. Is that normal for a 10-person startup?"
"My team wants standing desks and fancy equipment. Do I invest in that or tell them to deal with it?"
"Should we use HubSpot or Salesforce? HubSpot is easier but Salesforce seems more 'enterprise.'"
"Our product demo is 45 minutes long. Is that too long or is detailed good?"
"We're getting interest from a strategic investor who's also a potential acquirer. Should I be careful?"
"My cofounder wants to spend $50K on a conference booth. That seems insane. Is it?"
"Should we dogfood our own product or use best-in-class tools? Our product is janky right now."
"We're trying to decide on a growth model: virality vs paid vs content. Can you just do all three?"
"My early customers want features that new customers don't care about. Who do I build for?"
"Should our cancellation flow ask why they're leaving or just let them go quietly?"
"We're considering adding crypto payments. Is that useful or just trendy?"
"My investor wants board seats but we're just a seed stage. Is that normal?"
"Should we invest in SEO or is that too slow for a startup?"
"We're getting requests for a dark mode but that's like 3 weeks of work. Is it worth it?"
"My cofounder keeps working on side projects during work hours. How do I address that?"
"Should we have a clear ICP or try to serve multiple segments? We're getting mixed advice."
"We're doing user interviews but nobody wants to pay for the solution. Is that a validation problem?"
"My advisor wants 5% equity for introductions to investors. That seems high?"
"Should our product be workflow-based or feature-based? Not sure what that even means."
"We're getting interest from VCs but our numbers are still small. Should I wait or fundraise now?"
"My biggest customer wants a custom feature that nobody else will use. Do I build it?"
"Should we gate content behind Medium paywall or keep our blog open? Trying to monetize it."
"We're considering a rebrand after 6 months. Is that too early or does it not matter?"
"My cofounder wants to move to a 4-day workweek. Can an early-stage startup survive doing that?"
"Should we focus on improving our worst features or making our best features even better?"
"We're getting DMCA takedown requests for user-generated content. How do I handle this legally?"
"My team wants more autonomy but every time I delegate something gets messed up. What's the balance?"
"Should we have an affiliate program? Seems like everyone does but is it worth the effort?"
"We're trying to go viral on TikTok but our product is boring B2B software. Is that even possible?"
"My cofounder wants to relocate the company for tax reasons. Is that worth the hassle?"
"Should we patent our process or keep it as trade secret?"
"We're getting reviews saying our product is too complex. Do I simplify or find different customers?"
"My investor wants me to network more but I hate networking. Is it actually necessary?"
"Should we write case studies or white papers? Not sure what B2B buyers actually read."
"We're getting outbound interest from recruiters trying to poach our team. How do I retain people on a startup budget?"
"My cofounder wants to hire their ex-colleague who I don't think is good. How do I veto without causing conflict?"
"Should we have a customer advisory board? Seems like big companies do this."
"We're spending 30% of time on compliance and security. Is that normal for B2B SaaS?"
"My biggest competitor just shut down. Should I try to acquire their customers?"
"Should our app support offline mode? That's like 2 months of work."
"We're getting ghosted by investors after first meetings. Is that normal or is our pitch bad?"
"My team wants to switch from Slack to Discord. Does it actually matter?"
"Should we offer equity to early employees or just higher salaries?"
"We're getting customers from a country we've never marketed to. Should I localize?"
"My cofounder wants to write a book about our journey. Is that a distraction or good marketing?"
"Should we have a podcast? Everyone seems to have one now."
"We're getting feature parity with competitors but not growing faster. What else matters?"
"My customer success team wants to upsell customers but that feels pushy. Is that normal?"
"Should we build a Chrome extension or is that a distraction from the main product?"
"We're trying to do account-based marketing but only have 1 marketer. Is that realistic?"
"My cofounder wants to speak at every conference invitation. Is that helping us or just feeding their ego?"
"Should we use animated explainer video or just screenshots? Video is $15K."
"We're getting criticized for not having enough features but I thought MVP was the goal?"
"My team wants to attend expensive conferences. How do I decide which ones are worth it?"
"Should we optimize for ARR or logo count? Investors seem to care about both."
"We're doing cold outreach with 5% response rate. Is that good or terrible?"
"My cofounder's equity vesting is about to cliff and they're checked out. What do I do?"
"Should we have a developer evangelist at 20 people? Seems early."
"We're getting requests for invoice payment but we're credit card only. Should I add it?"
"My best customer wants a huge discount for a 3-year commitment. Should I take it?"
"Should we rebrand from a playful to serious brand as we go upmarket?"
"We're trying to build a sales team but can't afford enterprise AEs. Can junior reps close SMB deals?"
"My investor keeps introducing me to their portfolio companies for partnerships. Are these actually useful?"
"Should we have named pricing tiers (Starter, Pro, Enterprise) or generic (Plan 1, 2, 3)?"
"We're getting compliance questions from enterprise buyers. How much does SOC 2 certification cost?"
"My cofounder wants to sell equity to employees at current valuation. Isn't that what options are for?"
"Should our documentation be in-product or separate? Engineering wants separate, users want in-product."
"We're getting compared to a product that's way more expensive. Should I raise prices?"
"My team wants outcome-based compensation but that seems risky for a startup. Is it?"
"Should we have customer tiers (gold, silver, bronze) or treat everyone equally?"
"We're getting press inquiries asking for our revenue numbers. Should I share that?"
"My cofounder wants to move to product-led sales but we've always been sales-led. Can you switch mid-way?"
"Should we sponsor open source projects or is that just burning money?"
"We're trying to build a community but only 12 people show up to events. Is that a sign to quit?"
"My team wants to use AI for everything. Should I embrace it or be more selective?"
"Should we have a mobile-first design or responsive? Not sure what the difference is."
"We're getting acquisition interest from a company I don't respect. Is taking the meeting a waste of time?"
"My cofounder wants us to be fully async but I think we need more meetings. How do teams decide this?"
"Should our CTA be 'Start Free Trial' or 'Get Started'? Does wording actually matter?"
"We're spending $3K/month on Zoom and Slack. Should I negotiate better deals?"
"My investor is pushing me to hire a VP of Sales but we're only at $500K ARR. When's the right time?"
"Should we have multiple products or one product with modules? Not sure which is easier to sell."
"We're getting asked if we have an API. Should I build one or wait until we have more users?"
"My cofounder wants to share our metrics publicly. Is that transparency valuable or just giving competitors data?"
"Should we optimize for organic growth or paid acquisition? Can't afford both right now."
"We're getting users from a use case we never intended. Should I pivot positioning or stick to original vision?"
"My team wants unlimited books/courses budget. Is that normal or too generous?"
"Should we have a partner program or handle all customers directly?"
"We're trying to build a sales pipeline but don't know what a healthy pipeline looks like. Any benchmarks?"
"My cofounder keeps wanting to add features instead of fixing bugs. How do I convince them bugs matter?"
"Should we have customer health scores? Seems complex for early stage."
"We're getting interest from angel investors but I'm targeting VCs. Should I take angel money?"
"My best employee wants to work from another country. Should I figure out international payroll?"
"Should we charge for implementation or include it free? It takes us 10 hours per customer."
"We're trying to build brand but nobody knows what that means. What actually is brand?"
"My cofounder wants to do a big rebrand but we only have 200 customers. Will they even notice?"
"Should our product be horizontal (serve everyone) or vertical (specific industry)?"
"We're getting reviews about missing features that are actually there. Is that a discoverability problem?"
"My investor wants me to meet their other portfolio CEOs. Is that actually useful or just networking for show?"
"Should we have a roadmap page or keep future plans private?"
"We're trying to do content marketing but our CEO's writing is terrible. Should I ghostwrite for them?"
"My cofounder wants to raise prices 50% overnight. Isn't that going to piss off customers?"
"Should we optimize for product velocity or quality? Can't have both right now."
"We're getting enterprise deals but our product is built for SMB. Should I rebuild for enterprise?"
"My team wants to build internal tools before customer features. Is that ever the right priority?"
"Should we gate our pricing page behind a demo request? Some competitors do this."
"We're trying to hire in SF but can't compete with big tech salaries. Should I just hire remote?"
"My biggest customer wants us to become SOC 2 compliant. How long does that take?"
"Should we write our own contracts or use DocuSign templates? Legal fees are expensive."
"We're getting ghosted after demos. Is that a pricing issue or product issue?"
"My cofounder wants to do performance reviews after 6 months. Isn't that too early?"
"Should we offer concierge onboarding or let users self-onboard? We're at 50 customers."
"We're trying to compete on customer support since our product is similar to competitors. Is that a real differentiator?"
"My investor wants monthly updates but I only want to send quarterly. Who's right?"
"Should we have a credit card on file before trial ends or ask after?"
"We're getting requests for a desktop app but web works fine. Do people actually care about native apps?"
"My cofounder wants to give early customers lifetime deals. Isn't that going to hurt us later?"
"Should we focus on customer acquisition or expansion revenue?"
"We're getting compared to Salesforce but we're way simpler. Is being simple a positioning advantage?"
"My team wants to work on 'tech debt' for a month. Is that actually necessary?"
"Should we optimize landing pages for SEO keywords or conversion? My developer says we can't have both."
"We're getting customers who use the product totally wrong. Should I educate them or let them do their thing?"
"My cofounder wants to hire a brand designer for $120K. Isn't that excessive for a startup?"
"Should we have a customer-facing roadmap or is that giving competitors our strategy?"
"We're trying to build in a regulated industry. Should I hire a compliance person or use consultants?"
"My best customer churned after a pricing increase. Should I grandfather old customers?"
"Should we send NPS surveys or is that just annoying customers?"
"We're getting criticized for not being innovative but we're just executing better. Is that a problem?"
"My cofounder wants to hire their partner's consulting firm. Is that a conflict of interest?"
"Should we build a Chrome extension first or web app first?"
"We're getting inbound from customers who are terrible fit. Should I still take their money?"
"My team wants to migrate to microservices but we're only 3 engineers. Is that premature?"
"Should we offer money-back guarantee? Worried about people abusing it."
"We're trying to close deals faster. Should I add urgency (limited time offer) or is that manipulative?"
"My investor wants us to do a 'down round' rather than extend runway. How bad is that?"
"Should we build integrations or focus on core product? Customers keep asking for integrations."
"We're getting feature requests that contradict each other. How do I decide what to build?"
"My cofounder wants to acquire a competitor but we barely have revenue. Is that crazy?"
"Should we use pop-ups on our site? I hate them but apparently they work."
"We're trying to launch in Europe but GDPR seems complicated. Is it worth the hassle?"
"My team wants to rebrand our mascot. Does brand consistency actually matter for B2B?"
"Should we optimize for demo requests or free trial signups?"
"We're getting requests for custom SLAs. Should I offer them or is that overhead we can't handle?"
"My cofounder wants to start a podcast. Is that useful marketing or just vanity?"
"Should we price in USD only or support multiple currencies? We have international customers."
"We're trying to decide between freemium and free trial. What's actually better for B2B SaaS?"
"My biggest competitor is rebranding. Should I wait to see what they do or move forward with ours?"
"Should we invest in video content or stick to written? Video seems expensive."
"We're getting leads who want custom deployment. Should I offer on-premise?"
"My team wants to switch to remote-first permanently. Will that hurt collaboration?"
"Should we show customer logos on our site without asking? Competitors do it."
"We're trying to improve trial-to-paid conversion. Is 15% good or bad?"
"My cofounder wants to pivot based on 3 customer conversations. Isn't that too small a sample?"
"Should we offer live chat support or just email? Live chat seems resource-intensive."
"We're getting enterprise RFPs with 100+ questions. Should I even bother responding?"
"My investor wants me to attend more events. Is conference networking actually worth it?"
"Should we build in public or launch quietly? Seems like everyone builds in public now."
"We're trying to hire but nobody applies. Is our job posting bad or are we not paying enough?"
"My cofounder wants to sell to the public sector. Don't government deals take forever?"
"Should we have customer success managers or account managers? What's the difference?"
"We're getting requests for training materials. Should I create them or let customers figure it out?"
"My team wants equity refreshers but we just gave equity a year ago. Is annual normal?"
"Should we charge for customer support or include it free?"
"We're trying to build a sales playbook but don't know where to start. What should be in it?"
"My cofounder wants to hire a head of growth at $200K. Can't we just do growth ourselves?"
"Should we use AI-generated content for our blog or hire writers?"
"We're getting leads from LinkedIn but they never convert. Is LinkedIn even good for B2B?"
"My customer wants to co-develop features with us. Should I let them have input on roadmap?"
"Should we build a Slack bot or web app integration first?"
"We're trying to expand to healthcare but that seems heavily regulated. Should I even try?"
"My cofounder wants to offer coaching as a product add-on. Isn't that too service-y for SaaS?"
"Should we gate our best content in a weekly newsletter or make it all available?"
"We're getting asked for case studies but don't have permission from customers. Should I create anonymized ones?"
"My team wants to use Figma but I like Sketch. Does it actually matter?"
"Should we optimize for time-to-value or feature depth?"
"We're trying to raise but keep getting 'maybe later'. Is that soft rejection or should I follow up?"
"My cofounder wants everyone to work from office 3 days a week. Will that cause people to quit?"
"Should we offer partner co-marketing or is that just free work for them?"
"We're getting requests for a native iOS app. Should I build it or push people to web?"
"My biggest customer wants exclusive features. Should I charge extra or say no?"
"Should we create comparison pages (us vs Competitor)? Seems aggressive but competitors do it."
"We're trying to optimize customer onboarding. What's a good activation rate?"
"My cofounder wants to spend $10K on a video ad. Is video advertising worth it for B2B?"
"Should we have a separate enterprise tier or charge everyone the same?"
"We're getting criticized for copying a competitor. Should I respond or ignore it?"
"My investor wants us to do account-based everything but we don't have headcount. Is that realistic for startups?"
"Should we use product analytics or just talk to customers?"
"We're trying to figure out pricing. Should I price based on value or costs?"
"My cofounder wants to make the product AI-first. Isn't that just buzzwords?"
"Should we offer customer training or expect them to learn on their own?"
"We're getting heat for not having transparency reports. Do B2B companies actually need those?"
"My team wants to switch from Jira to Linear. Will that help or just cause chaos?"
"Should we build workflow automation into the product or integrate with Zapier?"
"We're trying to reduce churn. Should I focus on at-risk customers or improving product?"
"My cofounder wants to start a private equity fund after we exit. Isn't it too early to think about that?"
"Should we offer bulk discounts or keep per-user pricing?"
"We're getting enterprise interest but they want our data hosted in their country. How hard is that?"
"My team wants summer Fridays (half day). Can an early-stage startup afford that?"
"Should we optimize for expansion revenue or new logos?"
"We're trying to build a community-led growth motion. What does that even mean?"
"My cofounder wants to sell through resellers. Doesn't that just reduce margins?"
"Should we use customer testimonials in ads or is that too salesy?"
"We're getting inbound from VC firms asking us to apply. Is that normal or a red flag?"
"My best customer wants a dedicated Slack channel. Should I offer that to everyone?"
"Should we make our APIs public or keep them private? Worried about rate limiting."
"We're trying to decide between growth at all costs vs sustainable growth. Which is right for seed stage?"
"My cofounder wants to hire a 'chief of staff'. What does that role even do at a startup?"
"Should we send win-back campaigns to churned customers or leave them alone?"
"We're getting requests for SOC 2 Type 2. How long does that take after Type 1?"
"My investor wants me to hire their friend as an advisor. Is that a conflict of interest?"
"Should we gate our product demo behind a form or let anyone watch?"
"We're trying to expand into SMB but enterprise is where the money is. Which should I prioritize?"
"My cofounder wants to write a book before we're even profitable. Isn't that premature?"
"Should we use Intercom for customer support or build our own?"

"My team wants to attend a team retreat but that's $20K. Is that worth it?"
"Should we optimize our product for annual contracts or monthly?"

"My cofounder wants to sell the company to a PE firm. How is that different from strategic acquisition?"
"Should we invest in customer education or improve the product?"
"We're trying to compete with incumbents. Should I position as alternative or better?"
"My biggest customer is demanding a huge custom feature. Do I risk losing them or build it?"
"Should we use exit intent pop-ups? They seem annoying but apparently work."
"We're getting inbound from customers in industries we know nothing about. Should I turn them away?"
"My cofounder wants to go full async communication. Will that work for product development?"
"Should we offer certification programs for our product? Seems like enterprise software does this."
"We're trying to build a developer community. How do you incentivize contributions?"
"My team wants to switch to TypeScript from JavaScript. Is that worth the migration effort?"
"Should we make customer calls required or optional? Half the team hates them."
"We're getting asked for our carbon footprint. Do tech companies actually need to report that?"
"My cofounder wants to run paid ads on LinkedIn but it's $15/click. Is that normal?"
"Should we build a mobile app or PWA? What's the actual difference?"
"We're trying to improve our G2 rating. Should I ask happy customers to review or is that gaming the system?"
"My investor wants us to explore M&A opportunities. Isn't it too early to acquire anyone?"
"Should we offer trial extensions or is that just delaying the decision?"
"We're getting enterprise customers who want annual payment terms (net 60). Can we afford that?"
"My cofounder wants to take 2 weeks off. Can a startup survive without a founder for that long?"
"Should we optimize for product-qualified leads or marketing-qualified leads?"
"We're trying to build a referral engine into the product. Does that actually drive growth?"
"My team wants to switch from Google Workspace to Microsoft 365. Does it matter?"
"Should we create industry-specific landing pages or one general page?"
"We're getting acquisition interest from a company I admire. Should I at least hear them out?"
"My cofounder wants to hire a data scientist at 15 people. Don't we need more data first?"
"Should we offer white-glove onboarding for all customers or just enterprise?"
"We're trying to expand pricing tiers from 2 to 4. Will that help or confuse customers?"
"My biggest competitor just got acquired. Is that a good or bad sign for the market?"
"Should we use cold calling or is that dead for B2B SaaS?"
"We're getting requests for custom reports. Should I build a report builder or export data?"
"My cofounder wants to do weekly all-hands but we're only 12 people. Isn't that overkill?"
"Should we optimize for MRR or ARR at this stage?"
"We're trying to hire a VP of Marketing. Should they be product marketing or demand gen focused?"
"My investor wants us to consider a SPAC merger. Is that even a thing for early-stage companies?"
"Should we gate our best features or make everything available in trial?"
"We're getting asked about our AI strategy by every investor. Should I just say we use AI everywhere?"
"My cofounder wants to launch a podcast interviewing customers. Is that useful content or just busy work?"
"Should we optimize our checkout flow for speed or information collection?"
"We're getting enterprise logos but they're low ACV. Should I still showcase them?"
"My team wants to do innovation sprints but we have so much backlog. Is that a luxury we can afford?"
"Should we use predictive lead scoring or is our data set too small?"
"We're trying to decide on company values. Does anyone actually care about those?"
"My cofounder wants to offer unlimited vacation but I'm worried nobody will take time off. Is that a real problem?"
"Should we build a customer portal or is that over-engineering?"
"We're getting slammed with customer requests during holidays. Should I require on-call rotation?"
"My investor introduced me to a 'growth advisor' who wants 1% equity. Is that reasonable?"
"Should we create separate products for different verticals or one horizontal product?"
"We're getting reviewed on Reddit and the comments are brutal. Should I respond?"
"My cofounder wants to build a data warehouse before we have real data. Isn't that premature?"
"Should we optimize for logo retention or revenue retention?"
"We're trying to hire but candidates keep asking about exit plans. Should I be honest that there isn't one?"
"My biggest customer wants to invest in our next round. Is that a good or bad idea?"
"Should we send monthly product updates or is that just email spam?"
"We're getting pressure to add blockchain features. Is that necessary or just hype?"
"My cofounder wants to pivot to being AI-first. Aren't we already using AI where it makes sense?"
"Should we optimize for customer effort score or NPS?"
"We're trying to build a partner ecosystem. Should I hire a partner manager or do it myself?"
"My team wants to attend expensive training courses. How do I decide what's worth the investment?"
"Should we use tiered support (basic vs premium) or offer same support to everyone?"

"My cofounder wants to sell equity to customers. Isn't that going to complicate cap table?"
"Should we build reporting dashboards or let customers export to their own BI tools?"
"We're trying to launch faster. Should I cut features or extend timeline?"
"My investor wants us to hire faster but quality is suffering. What's the right pace?"
"Should we optimize for weekly active users or monthly active users?"

"My cofounder wants to create a separate brand for enterprise vs SMB. Isn't that too complex?"
"Should we use founder-led sales forever or hire an AE?"

"My team wants to do pair programming. Isn't that just half the productivity?"
"Should we gate our roadmap behind customer login or make it public?"
"We're trying to improve sales velocity. Should I focus on shortening sales cycle or increasing deal size?"
"My cofounder wants to create a fellowship program. Isn't that just free labor?"
"Should we optimize landing pages for mobile or desktop? Traffic is split."
"We're getting asked about diversity metrics. Should startups publish those?"
"My investor wants us to raise a bridge round. How is that different from extending runway?"
"Should we use magic links for login or traditional password?"
"We're trying to go upmarket but losing our SMB base. Can you serve both well?"
"My cofounder wants to license our technology to competitors. Isn't that helping them?"
"Should we send drip campaigns to inactive users or let them churn gracefully?"

"My team wants to rebuild the entire app in a new framework. Is that ever justified?"
"Should we optimize for session length or session frequency?"

"My cofounder wants to create an invite-only tier. Isn't that just artificial scarcity?"
"Should we publish salary bands publicly or keep them internal?"

"My investor wants us to add generative AI to everything. Where does it actually make sense?"
"Should we optimize for gross retention or net retention?"

"My cofounder wants to sell through channel partners. Doesn't that mean losing control?"
"Should we use customer health scoring or is our data too messy?"

"My team wants to do quarterly planning but we're so early that plans change weekly. Is structure helpful or limiting?"
"Should we gate our API documentation or make it fully public?"

"Should we optimize for paid conversion rate or free user growth?"

"Should we create customer councils for product feedback or is that just groupthink?"

"Should we use consumption-based pricing or flat-rate? Our costs are mostly fixed."

"My team wants to switch to a 4-day workweek permanently. Can we compete with companies doing 5 days?"
"Should we invest in brand marketing or performance marketing at seed stage?"
"We're trying to justify higher prices. Should I add features or improve positioning?"
"My cofounder wants to open-source our core tech. Won't competitors just use it?"
"Should we optimize for product adoption or product retention first?"
"We're getting customers who use the product in ways we never imagined. Should I build for their use case or original vision?"
"My investor wants monthly board meetings. Isn't quarterly enough for seed stage?"
"Should we offer customer co-marketing opportunities or is that just free advertising for them?"
"We're trying to build a sales development team. How many SDRs per AE is normal?"

"Should we optimize for feature velocity or code quality at this stage?"

"Should we use founder story in marketing or focus purely on product benefits?"

"Should we optimize for multi-year contracts or keep it flexible? Investors want predictable revenue."
